subSubSection.paragraph: Hydrobius neglectus Hope, 1854: 16. Type locality: Guangzhou, China.
China (Fujian, Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, Hong Kong, Hubei, Hunan, Jiangsu, Jiangxi, Shanghai, Sichuan, Yunnan, Zhejiang), Cambodia, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam. New for Hong Kong.
This species occurs in mud with aquatic grass at the edge of pool, or under root of waterside grass on the bank of slow stream. It can sometimes be collected by light trap.
